page.title: 20Church of England in Clun
page.content:
The vicar teaches the Christian faith in the day school and in adult discussion groups. The church in Clun is run by the vicar together with the Parochial Church Council which is elected annually by the church membership. The council elects a secretary and treasurer. The annual meeting elects church wardens who are responsible for the upkeep of the church.
The information for this project was collected by Class 1 of St. George's C.E. (Aided) Primary School, Clun and their headteacher(1984/85).
